delhivery package¶

Submodules¶

delhivery.constants module¶

Note

All constants required for Delhivery API are placed here.

delhivery.helper module¶

Note

It contains XML helper parser methods required to parse the response sent by delhivery.

class delhivery.helper.DelhiveryXMLHelper(xml_string)¶

Bases: object

This is a helper class which parses the xml response send by the delhivery to JSON

parse()¶

This method simply parses the initialized xml_string to JSON Response Args:

None
Returns:JSON equivalent of the xml_string

delhivery.response_handler module¶

Note

This file parses the response for all Delhivery API call.

class delhivery.response_handler.ResponseHandler(response)¶

Bases: object

This is a helper class which creates valid response for all Delhivery API calls

json()¶

It converts response to JSON Args:

None
Returns:JSON response
set_properties()¶

It sets the properties for the response Args:

None
Returns:Formatted JSON equivalent

delhivery.services module¶

Note

It contains all the core service methods required for the delhivery.

class delhivery.services.CancelShipment(user_profile)¶

Bases: delhivery.DelhiveryBase

Cancels the previously created shipment in delhivery.

class delhivery.services.CreatePackage(user_profile)¶

Bases: delhivery.DelhiveryBase

Create the new shipment in delhivery.

class delhivery.services.CreatePickup(user_profile)¶

Bases: delhivery.DelhiveryBase

delhivery.user_profile module¶

Date: 10/02/2017 File: user_profile This file sets the user credentials for Delhivery profile.

class delhivery.user_profile.UserProfile(client_name, api_token, debug=False)¶

Bases: object

Set the user credentials for API requests.

Module contents¶

Note

This file contains the Base class which will set the client name and api token for making the delhivery API calls

class delhivery.DelhiveryBase(user_profile)¶

Bases: object

This class contains the abstract methods that are needed for preparing request and response for making calls Delhivery.

send_request(data)¶

Used to send the final JSON response and to be called by subclass. It internally override the _send_request of subclass.

Args:
data - It contains the payload needed for the API Call
Returns:Response
